Worm
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): FAQ: All The Skill Cards: Worm
By Anonymous on Monday, June 25, 2001 - 10:51 pm:

ATTACKS


card namegutsdamagepow/intspecial effect
Tusk Slash33powdouble damage to monsters in air
Tail Lash33powtail lashes can be used at same time. when 2 are used gives 12 damage
Bite33powcannot be blocked
Pierce44powhalf damage even if dodged
Pinch Throw55powif hit monster cannot attack next turn
Roll Assault68powhalf damage even if dodged
Worm Hole710pow--
Poison Gas53intdamages all monsters except worm


SPECIAL


card namegutseffect
Cocoon0this monster may now only use emergence card
Emerge0only can be used after cocoon. replace this with worm's sub monster. new monster cannot attack this turn


DEFENSES


card namegutsblk/dgeeffect
Shell2blk-3 pow attacks
Sidestep2dgedodges all pow/int moves using more than 2 guts
